damienAway.name: Suzanne
text: Hmm, I thought that everyone would be at home these days.

damienHome.name: Suzanne
text: Hello Sir, I'm looking for someone who could potentially go grocery shopping for me.
Would you, by any chance, be willing to help me?

damienReply.name: Damien
text: Sorry Ma'am, I'm currently following an online course.
Could you please ask somebody else?
Otherwise, I can always do it for you later.

PatrickHome.name: Suzanne
text: Good day, would you, by any chance, be willing to help me with something?
I need someone to go grocery shopping for me.

patrickReply.name: Patrick
text: Yes, of course, gladely Ma'am. I was actually planning on going later today.

patrickReturn.name: Patrick
text: Here you go Ma'am, your groceries and change.
I hope that I didn't forget to get anything.

suzanneReply.name: Suzanne
text: It's quite difficult not being able to do the groceries anymore.

patrickFinalReply.name: Patrick
text: Don't hesitate to ask me, if ever you need anything!
